website_summaries.verdict: Defend the environment as well as your skin with this natural, mineral-based sunscreen.
pros: A completely eco-friendly and biodegradable product, with no harmful compounds like oxybenzone, octinoxate, or propylene glycol
Broad-spectrum SPF 30 protection will keep you healthy at the beach, with no gluten, fragrances, or irritants to ruin the fun
Water resistant for up to 80 minutes
No animal testing done in development
cons: Some users have reported an off-putting smell

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: 1. This stuff smells bad. 2. It separates easily and it difficult to get to mix back together. 3. It was so greasy. 4. It was nearly impossible to spread it on evenly/make the white disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Hurrah!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this sunscreen. While it is a bit oily when first applied, unless you apply too much, it gets completely absorbed into the skin about 20 minutes later. And the oils are good for your skin. There is a white cast when first applied, but that also goes away after you adequately rub it in. I am thrilled with not only the nontoxic and healthy ingredients, but also with the price. Most nontoxic sunscreens are more expensive and only give you 1.7 to 2.3 ounces, versus the 4 ounces for this one. I will purchase this sunscreen again and again.
customer_reviews.author: GZ Girl

customer_reviews.title: Works Well!
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully! I took it with me to Capetown South Africa, and it was important to me I did not leave chemicals in the ocean when I went paddle boarding and in general. The only thing holding back from a 5 start review is the oiliness of it. I was not burnt once using it however even in the burning heat. For the peace of mind there were no toxic chemicals for neither myself or the environment, and for a natural product that works so well, a bit of oiliness I can make do with.
customer_reviews.author: Schmart

customer_reviews.title: Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife who complained that it was too watery. After inspecting it, turns out that it's just separated. There is a block of hard white stuff on the bottom, and water-like liquid on the top. I have shaken the bottle continuously and cannot get them to combine.
customer_reviews.author: Brandizzle

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite sunscreens
customer_reviews.text: This is a great natural sunscreen. I don't like putting toxins into my body and most sunscreens are FILLED with them. However, this one is not at all, which I love! It smells really good which I wasn't expecting, so that was a bonus. As it is a natural sunscreen it does take more work to rub it in so you aren't left with white skin. However, it is worth it when you are protecting your skin and not massaging in chemicals. I absolutely recommend this sunscreen!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole P

customer_reviews.title: All natural and a little bit goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this sunscreen is all natural as most sunscreens today contain toxic ingredients. It is very creamy and a little bit goes a long way. It uses natural minerals as the active ingredient so there is a whiteness to it that you have to rub in well if you don't want to have a whitish tint. That doesn't bother us too much as we would rather be well protected naturally. It doesn't have much of a scent either, which is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Brought this with me to universal Studios. My mom and I are both very fair skinned and so was my red haired freckled friend who came with us. I think it's a huge testament to this product that we only reapplied once all day and none of us got a sun burn! A little goes a long way and it doesn't have a strong "sunscreen" smell to it. Make it in small bottles for fitting into pockets next!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the product. It states that it is good for darker skin b/c it absorbs and doesn't have the white sheen that zinc tends to leave. This was very much NOT the case. It has a silvery finish that does not blend in at all. I was excited about a product for Black skin so it was sad that it did not work out.
customer_reviews.author: CocoLue

customer_reviews.title: Great spreadability and sun protection
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way. This spreads smoothly and provides great sun protection, and it seems odorless to me. Initially, you will look like you are wearing white Kabuki makeup. However, if you follow the instrucltions to apply 15 minutes before going into the sun and you spread the lotion thoroghly, it stops looking so white and gives great protection.
customer_reviews.author: H.G. Sanes

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was looking for an effective and more importantly eco-friendly sunscreen to use this summer. The product fit what I wanted with the eco-friendlyness. It takes a long time to absorb, that was my only negative. It was kind of hard to rub in and then kind of just stayed on my skin for a while. It did work well though, no burn! It did what I wanted and needed for a good price so it was worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: madilyn

customer_reviews.title: Love this sunscreen!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sunscreen!!! I'm a huge fan of mineral sunscreen vs chemical sunscreen and this one is great! It's easier to apply and rub on the skin than others I've tried in the past. Holds up great when I go for my walks mid-day in the Florida sun! Very happy with this sunscreen!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Not hold up against sweat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was told it help up to the sweat test, but it does not. But it is amazing sunscreen if you are not doing hard exercise in the sun like I do. I wear it to the beach and it works wonderfully. It is my everyday sunscreen as long as I am rub it in really well because it does appear a bit white - but it is a nice sheen/glow to the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Randy l

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunscreen - and no chemicals
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great sunscreen. Arrived really quickly and it's natural and I can use it on my kids. We're in Florida and go through sunscreen really fast, so it's nice to know that we can order a very high quality sunscreen and have it arrive so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: J + A

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but priced too high
customer_reviews.text: Pros: natural ingrediants (which is why I ordered it); used it once and it seemed to work fine Cons: pricey; VERY thick, takes a very long time to rub in (grandson said it made him look like a clown); unsented, would be nice to have a pleasant odor All in all, and given only used once, I would still recommend for those with top priority of natural ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie from Delaware

customer_reviews.title: Works great, person and planet healthy
customer_reviews.text: A healthy non-scented (thank goodness!) invisible sunblock cream. Very comfortable to apply and wear, and it moisturizes the skin on top of providing great sun protection with no harmful ingredients. Very happy with this purchase, and with Christina Moss products in general (LOVE the shampoo and conditioner too).
customer_reviews.author: Madrigal

customer_reviews.title: Greasy, expensive, effective.
customer_reviews.text: OK, so this stuff is expensive, and the oil tends to separate from the rest of the sunscreen, meaning you have to shake it. However, this does work much better than Mercola's SPF 30, and it rubs in better so you don't look like a white ghost. I still get burnes with the Mercola stuff, this is more effective. I will likely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: trail.biker

product_meta.title: Sunscreen - Sunblock SPF 30 - Mineral Based - Made with Natural Ingredients - UVA, UVB, Broad Spectrum, Water Resistant, Eco-Friendly, Non Nano, Nontoxic - Unscented 4oz Christina Moss Naturals

Our sunscreen is gentle yet effective and is a great sunscreen for kids and baby too.

WATER RESISTANT 80 MINUTES AND ECO-FRIENDLY: Our Sunblock is water resistant up to 80 minutes. Please follow the instructions on the back of the box. Our formula is Eco-Friendly and Biodegradable. It is coral and reef safe and is also cruelty free. No animal testing.

NONCOMEDOGENIC, NON NANO, NON ALLERGENIC: Our formula was made for all skin types and is a great sunscreen for sensitive skin. It is completely free of Gluten, Parabens, Synthetic Chemical Fragrance, Retinyl Palmitate, PABA, Oxybenzone, Propylene Glycol, SLS, SLES and Phthalates. It is also great for people healing from tattoo work who need a sunscreen for tattoos.

UVA/UVB BROAD SPECTRUM PROTECTION: Our SPF 30 blend sun block is a mineral-based, broad-spectrum formula that protects your skin from the harmful rays from the sun, allowing you to enjoy your time outdoors without having to worry about it. And it does this without the use of any harsh toxic chemicals.

WE GUARANTEE YOU’LL BE HAPPY WITH IT: As with all of our products, we guarantee your satisfaction. Our formula is mineral based and as such, it is a white cream. It won’t leave a sticky residue, but it will leave a slightly white hue to your skin due to the mineral base. Should there be any reason you aren’t happy with it, just get in touch and we’ll make things right.
